input.sentences: today is my daughter [female] 's fifth birthday and we are throwing her a party .
all of her friends from daycare showed up . we have many fun activities planned for her .
we rented a moon bounce for her to enjoy .
we also hired a magician for the kids to watch perform tricks .
and of course we had birthday cake . [female] told me this is her favorite birthday ever !
output.sentences: The birthday party was about to begin.
Three girls are having fun together for Cat's birthday.
A bunch of kids on in a bouncy castle.
Kids prepare to be entertained by the birthday girl opening her presents.
The kids wait to eat cake to celebrate Cat's birthday.
